During the course of implementation of the projects, it has been observed that the provisions  relating escalation on all component of works except variations evaluated at present rate for PPCs in respect of some of the projects (in particular; projects falling under Chennai-Kolkata Section of GQ) have been worded differently: In view of this, the Project Directors have been advised to withhold the payment o account of price escalation under these Contracts   However, wherever the payments have already been made, have been advised not recover the same. The matter   is under examination in NHAI in consultation with Ministry of Law and a final decision is yet to be taken in this regard. 2_ In the meanwhile, the Contractors have representing for allowing payment on account of escalation so as not to hamper their work output during the current working season_ They have also expressed that are ready to give undertakingaffidavit to enable NHAI to recover the amount on account of the escalation with interest at SBI PLR, if the final decision goes against them: 13_ Till a final decision is taken by NHAI in this it has been decided in the interest  of work and keeping in view the current working season; to pay 'without prejudice" adjustment on all components of works except variations evaluated at present rates for IPCs from now onwards subject to the following conditions (a) That such payments shall be made till the gross cumulative progress payments reach a level of 75% of the contract price including variations, etc. (b) An undertaking shall be obtained from the contractor that the amount so shall be recovered by NHAI with interest at SBI PLR in case either (i) the final decision goes against them with regard to price escalation or (ii) the gross cumulative progress   payments reach level of 75%/ of the contract including   variations, etc. whichever is earlier; from the   remaining PCs thereafter. (c) This shall not be applicable to previous IPCs already (d) An undertaking from the contractor shall also be obtained that the release of the amount itself will not be presumed to mean that a liability under the escalation has been admitted by NHAI Contd 4Y price day they been price they paid price along tegard, price day paid along price paid. price
